title: Megan Barton-Hanson gets over Chelcee Grimes split as she 'parties with James Lock'
text:

Megan Barton-Hanson is reportedly moving past her split from Chelcee Grimes by partying with James Lock.

But sadly, it doesn't look like there's any romance on the cards.

The Love Island beauty broke up with girlfriend Chelcee Grimes just last week, but is said to have been getting over it by partying with her famous pals.

Megan, 25, was spotted hanging out at a star-studded bash in Manchester on Saturday, where TOWIE star James was among the guests.

According to OK! Online , Megan and James were "all over each other" as they partied at the launch of new dating app Love At First Swipe.

(Image: Supplied by WENN)

(Image: Instagram)

A source said: "Megan had a great night letting her hair down at the Love At First Swipe launch party and made some new friends.

"James attended with Jack [Fincham], but soon got to know Megan and they all had a great time together.

"They were getting quite close but you could tell there was nothing romantic in it. Megan was just having a really good time getting to know the TOWIE stars."

And James, who split from co-star Yazmin Oukhellou earlier this year was reportedly overheard telling his friends he had no plans to spark up a romance with Wes Nelson's ex.

(Image: Chelcee Grimes/Instagram)

(Image: Getty)

Megan and her ex Chelcee, a footballer and singer-songwriter, are said to have discovered they were both texting the same girl before they broke up.

The couple were supposedly both speaking to events promoter Teddy Edwardes, who took to Twitter to uncover her sticky situation.

Teddy recently shared with her Twitter followers: "I’ve got a girl and her girlfriend in my DM’s but neither of them know the other is doing it.

"When do I break the news or do I carry on and mind my business?"

(Image: E4)

The night club promoter - who previously dated X Factor's Lucy Spraggan - didn't name the culprits but later alluded to the drama following the headlines.

She wrote: "How have I been single 5 minutes and already become centre stage of every lesbian drama? Just let me lesbian in peace for gods sake."

A source told The Sun that it was Megan's other ex-girlfriend, TOWIE star Demi Sims, 23, who told Chelcee that Megan was messaging Teddy.

Mirror Online has contacted Megan's representatives for comment.
